summary: Created desktop entry and script for launching specific Figma design file (HooshEx/iLearn E-Learning Commerce UI Design) as standalone Chrome app. User can now launch it from applications menu or terminal. Ready to connect Cursor MCP Plugin once Figma is open.
current_status: Figma design file configured as desktop app. User can launch it and connect Cursor MCP Plugin to establish connection for reading designs and completing homepage implementation.
